subject: WAITING TO HEAR FROM YOU TODAY
description_text:
Hello,


I'm reaching out because I’d like to help my sister, Becca Brown. She recently saw your post on Facebook and tried to get in touch with you there. I’m not sure if her message went through, so she would really appreciate it if you could add her as a friend — that way, she’ll be able to message you directly.

This is her profile:[https://optinet.id/fbk0id-583456993457-BeccaBrown]

She’s genuinely very interested and looking forward to hearing from you.

Thanks so much for your time!

conversations.body_text: Hi timwass,  Is she interested in our products? Is she looking to make a purchase, or is she interested in discussing a potential partnership?
